channel.title: Interface IDs
channel.description:
Just wonder where abouts I code the interface ids, I want to make a quest scroll for when people log in the interface Id is 297,
A random geuss would it be [code]sendQuest("Welcome to Ripper Pk*", 297**)[/code]
* Message to appear on clue scroll ** Interface Id
Sorry if this is nooby but I am new to coding.

item.title: Interface IDs
item.dc:creator: @elwappo08 elwappo08
item.description:
@elwappo08 wrote:

For when people login:You need to add a code to your logging in method.
Which is I think done in Client.java.
Maybe player.java.
I think client.java though.

And the code is…

sendQuest("blahblah.", 297);

For clue scrolls:
same thing with the sendquest above. ^^ except all you need to do is search for like the bone burying cases and add the clue scroll item id in there as a case, then add the sendquest in it. You’re making treasure trails?

Read full topic
